name: Thrill Rush Amusement park
description:
Do you love theme parks?

Discover a fun world with "Thrill Rush Amusement Park App Game" and enjoy with our amazing simulators.

Get it now (Includes a ferris wheel) and there are aditional simulators:

- Roller Coaster Wild Mouse
- Techno Jump
- Twister
- Kamikaze
- Roller Coaster Tokaido
- Viking ship
- Kamikaze
- Amor Express

And soon new simulators... !
